TextView.android:text: 'The List of UK police forces' option displays the list of police forces in UK, more details about a particular force are given when a particular force is selected in the list. The 'List of Crimes at a specific location ' option displays the list of crimes for a particular date (yyyy-mm) and at a particular location,more details about a particular crime are given when a particular crime id is selected in the list. The 'Favourites' option displays the list of crimes ids of crime which were added to favourites.
